trans-unit.source: Represents a shortcut to an application in the Windows 7 taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 表示在 Windows 7 工作列跳躍清單中的應用程式捷徑。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> can be thought of as a shortcut to an application.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>可視為應用程式的捷徑。

trans-unit.source: You specify the path to the executable file by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您指定可執行檔的路徑，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A> is not set, the path of the current running process is implied.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A>未設定，就會隱含目前正在執行的處理序的路徑。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally specify <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Arguments%2A> to pass to the application at startup.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地指定<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Arguments%2A>傳遞至在啟動應用程式。

trans-unit.source: You can set basic display properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Description%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourcePath%2A> to specify the appearance of the task in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定基本的顯示屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Description%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourcePath%2A>跳躍清單中指定工作的外觀。

trans-unit.source: An icon used with a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> must be available as a native resource.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用的圖示<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>必須可以當做原生資源。

trans-unit.source: If multiple icon resources are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個圖示可用的資源 DLL 或可執行檔中，您會指定要使用藉由指示中的位移<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> will be placed in the **Tasks** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>將放置於**工作**跳躍清單的類別。

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom grouping of tasks by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定來指定工作的自訂群組<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立，以視覺化方式分隔跳躍清單中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>沒有<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>指定。

trans-unit.source: This empty <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 這個空白<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>將會顯示為水平線跳躍清單中。

trans-unit.source: In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，可以設定其他屬性，但它們不會有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in markup.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>標記中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to configure a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens the Calculator application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>會開啟 [小算盤] 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應用程式的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path to the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A> property is not specified, then the path of the current running process is implied.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A>未指定屬性，則會隱含目前正在執行的處理序的路徑。

trans-unit.source: An application can contain tasks for executables other than itself.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以包含非其本身的可執行檔的工作。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in markup.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>標記中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to configure a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens the Calculator application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>會開啟 [小算盤] 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the arguments passed to the application on startup.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在啟動時傳遞給應用程式的引數。

trans-unit.source: The arguments passed to the application on startup.
trans-unit.target: 要在啟動時傳遞給應用程式的引數。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in markup.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>標記中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the tooltip for the task in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定針對跳躍清單中工作顯示於工具提示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the tooltip for the task.
trans-unit.target: 針對工作顯示於工具提示中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in markup.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>標記中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to configure a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens the Calculator application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>會開啟 [小算盤] 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zero-based index of an icon embedded in a resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內嵌於資源中之圖示的索引 (以零為起始)。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the icon, or -1 if no icon is used.
trans-unit.target: 圖示之以零起始的索引，如果沒有使用圖示，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: An icon used with a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> must be available as a native resource.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用的圖示<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>必須可以當做原生資源。

trans-unit.source: If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個圖示可用 DLL 或可執行檔中，您會指定要使用藉由指示中的位移<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何圖示資源，或如果找不到指定的圖示時，會顯示標準的系統 圖示。

trans-unit.source: To specify that no icon is displayed, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A> property to -1.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定無圖示會顯示，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>屬性設為-1。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in markup.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>標記中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to a resource that contains the icon to display in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資源的路徑，這個資源包含要顯示於跳躍清單中的圖示。

trans-unit.source: The path to a resource that contains the icon.
trans-unit.target: 包含圖示之資源的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An icon used with a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> must be available as a native resource.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用的圖示<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>必須可以當做原生資源。

trans-unit.source: If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個圖示可用 DLL 或可執行檔中，您會指定要使用藉由指示中的位移<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何圖示資源，或如果找不到指定的圖示時，會顯示標準的系統 圖示。

trans-unit.source: To specify that no icon is displayed, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A> property to -1.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定無圖示會顯示，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>屬性設為-1。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in markup.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>標記中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to configure a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens the Calculator application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>會開啟 [小算盤] 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the task in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定針對跳躍清單中工作所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed for the task in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 針對跳躍清單中工作所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> property must be set for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> to appear in the Jump List as a clickable task.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>才會出現在跳躍清單做為可點按的工作。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以視覺化方式分隔跳躍清單中的項目建立<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>沒有<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>指定。

trans-unit.source: This empty <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 這個空白<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>將會顯示為水平線跳躍清單中。

trans-unit.source: In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，可以設定其他屬性，但它們不會有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in markup.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>標記中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens a text file name `readme.txt` in the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>開啟文字檔案名稱`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to configure a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens the Calculator application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>會開啟 [小算盤] 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the working directory of the application on startup.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應用程式在啟動時的工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: The working directory of the application on startup.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式在啟動時的工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> in markup.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何宣告<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>標記中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。
